text: Yadi asu labhera sambhabana thakato ebam yatrapatha'o sanksipta hato, tabe tara abasya'i apanara sahayatri hato, kintu tadera nikata yatrapatha sudirgha mane hala. Ara tara emana'i sapatha kare balabe, amadera sadhya thakale abasya'i tomadera sathe bera hatama, era nijera'i nijedera binasta karache, ara allaha janena ye, era mithyabadi.
